title: Cannot get file extension from swt FileDialog
description: The file extension cannot be obtained from the swt FileDialog, making it difficult to determine the correct file extension to append to the file name.
OB: The export wizard does not automatically append the file extension to the file name when saving a JAR file.
EB: The export wizard should automatically append the file extension, '.zip', to the file name when saving a JAR file.
SR: When saving a file using the JAR export wizard, the file extension '.zip' should be automatically appended to the file name field.
